name: Sneonake
description:
Welcome to Sneonake. Ever wondered what will happen when you mix a snake-like game with bullet hell and rhythm mechanics? Well, now you can see.

Help feed Sneonake with cookies (represented as blue squares) and avoid getting hit by bullets. After getting hit for the third time, your game will end. Try to achieve highest score possible!

Music made by pawles22.
Listen to it on youtube.
Listen to it on newgrounds
